Daemos: Anachronox, stand back. He is not an enemy. I am afraid, 
Pacifix, that he is right. Our renewal chamber reformatted him in 
order to repair him, but he has lost his ancient self in the process. 

Belthassan: That is true. I found him first. He seems to have no 
memories of his life before that of Anachronox...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Pacifix / Anachronox --
> 
> Pacifix follows Tankor into the control room.
> 
> "Thank you, Daemos," He looks around, immediately spotting 
> Anachronox, who was standing uncannily imobile near Belthassan. "Is 
> this," He indicates Anachonox with his line of sight, "Fire Drill?"
> 
> Anachronox suddenly moves, standing to his full 16 feet, dwarfing 
> Pacifix by a considerable 4 feet, "I," thunders Anachronxo, "am 
> Anachronox. I have never been Fire Drill, and I have never known 
> Fire Drill." He walks up to Pacifix, his feet making clicking sounds 
> on the ground, and looks the Autobot Commander intensely in the eye.
> 
> Pacifix stands his ground, and looks Anachonox back in the eye with 
> equal, if not more, intensity. "Daemos?" Questions Pacifix refering 
> to whether he was correct about this being the creature that was 
> Fired Drill; however, his own intuition had already confirmed it.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tankor: Ok then, follow me.
> > 
> > He leads the way to the control room.
> > 
> > Tankor: Commander, Pacifix is here.
> > 
> > Daemos: Pacifix! Welcome to the Shadow Destiny!
